    Last added to Crypto Airdrops, Bounties & Opportunities
    Name Date How to access Official URL Additional Info
    Vaultoro Token Launch PromoUntil September 4, 2019 The crypto-gold exchange Vaultoro has been around for years, getting attention in the 2015 bear market and tagging along through the subsequent bull run. They are now launching their own exchange token which you can get for free if you don't have an account yet. Every new sign up with basic ID verification gets 200 VAULT tokens.homepagemake acct
    FanEspo Big Competition (ERC20)All the time Fanespo is launching a new promotion contest worth $500 in FAN tokens. Details will pop up on you when you sign up on site. Overall, the eSports platform FanEspo is giving away the total of $1.6 million of tokens in contests. You need to have a FanEspo account.detailsmake acct
    BlockWage Airdrops + BountiesRecurring Platform for freelancers marketplace. Airdrops randomly announced via Discord, there's also the possibility of Masternodes.joinweb

    Market timing tools provide just the starting point of decision making but they are not as dubious as they are sometimes portrayed. - 29 Jun 2019

    STRATEGY 3 Tips: How to vet ICOs and what to watch once you're in
    To some crypto traders ICOs are so 2017, to some they are a great concept democratizing finance. There are scams and failures but one way to work with token markets is to take the past failure data and draw valuable information from them. - 26 Feb 2018
